src:
Liverpool Resmi Bakal Mainkan Dua Tim Berbeda, Siasati Jadwal Bentrok
06 Nov 2019, 00:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Raksasa Inggris, Liverpool memastikan bahwa mereka akan memainkan dua tim berbeda untuk menyiasati bentroknya jadwal perempat final Carabao Cup dan semifinal Piala Dunia Antarklub.
Sebelumnya, Liverpool lolos ke perempat final Carabao Cup usai menyingkirkan Arsenal di putaran keempat. Di babak delapan besar ini, The Reds bakal bertamu ke markas Aston Villa.
Namun kelolosan ini membuat kubu Liverpool pusing karena sebelumnya mereka lebih dulu sudah dipastikan akan berpartisipasi di ajang Piala Dunia Antarklub 2019 dengan status jawara Liga Champions.
text:
Liverpool Officially Will Play Two Different Teams, Siasati Schedule Clash
Nov 6 2019, 00:05 by Bola.net
Soccer - English giants Liverpool have ensured that they will play two different teams to get around the clash of the Carabao Cup quarter-final schedule and the Club World Cup semifinals.
Previously, Liverpool qualified for the Carabao Cup quarter-finals after getting rid of Arsenal in the fourth round. In the last eight, the Reds will visit Aston Villa headquarters.
But this breakthrough makes the Liverpool camp dizzy because beforehand they had already been confirmed to be participating in the 2019 Club World Cup event with Champions League championship status.
